definition: actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to

sentences.english: 1913 - The USA introduces an income tax.
In addition, the transfer of housing but also for value-added part of the paid income tax.
sentences.chinese: 此外，房屋转让时还要为增值部分缴纳个人所得税。

sentences.english: Must all the personal income tax be with-held and paid by institution?
sentences.chinese: 个人所得税都是代扣代缴的吗？

sentences.english: So I believe in a very progressive tax on income.
sentences.chinese: 所以我更信奉一个非常“激进”的所得税体系。

sentences.english: The income tax is to be reimposed next year after ten years' exemption.
sentences.chinese: 所得税经过十年的豁免后将于明年重新征收。

sentences.english: The formula achieves progressivity in much the same way as the federal income tax.
sentences.chinese: 这个计算公式像联邦个人所得税一样实行累进制。

sentences.english: Others include luxury tax, inheritance tax, and corporate income tax.
sentences.chinese: 其他包括奢侈税，继承税和企业所得税。

sentences.english: Finally, give the complete collection of Lanzhou City personal income tax policy proposals.
sentences.chinese: 最后，提出完善兰州市个人所得税征管的对策建议。

sentences.english: Do you know the pay as you go withholding reporting obligations?
sentences.chinese: 你知道所得税代扣代缴的义务吗？

sentences.english: Prominent Republicans have challenged Mr. Buffett to release his income-tax return.
sentences.chinese: 数名知名共和党人要求巴菲特公布其所得税申报表。

sentences.english: The United States imposes an income tax on individuals and corporations.
sentences.chinese: 美国向个人及企业课征所得税。

sentences.english: The mechanics for claiming this income tax allowance were developed by the district .
sentences.chinese: 该保护区发展了索取这种所得税补贴费的技巧。

sentences.english: Edgeworth's early study of optimal income taxes indicated that after-tax incomes should be equal.
sentences.chinese: 埃斯沃琪对最适所得税的早期研究指出。

sentences.english: The taxation system of businesses and income tax is completely broken and non-functional.
sentences.chinese: 企业和个人所得税税务体系完全是瘫痪的，不起作用。

sentences.english: He listed four dependents on his income-tax form.
sentences.chinese: 他在所得税表格上填写了四个受赡养人。

sentences.english: The government issues a warning that those who won't pay income taxes will be billed.
sentences.chinese: 政府发出了警告，凡不愿付所得税的人将被罚款。

definition: personal income tax (abbr. for 個人所得稅|个人所得税)
to file an income tax return/to declare dutiable goods (at customs)
to claim a credit against/tax reduction
